scenes.background: [Monica] sighs and leans back in her chair, questioning your reliability.
scenes.description: Bob leans forward. 'If you're more accessible, doesn't that defeat the purpose of your leave?'

options.text: I think balancing availability and rest is crucial. Let's find a middle ground.
options.analysis: You show moderate emotional perception and self-regulation while attempting to balance work and personal life, but empathy and social skills could be better.

options.text: You're right. Maybe I should just delegate better next time.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the concern and suggest better delegation, showing good empathy and social skills, but emotional perception and motivation are lower.

options.text: I understand. I'll make sure to set clear boundaries so I can focus on my leave but still be reachable for critical tasks.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and emotional perception by setting clear boundaries, but empathy could be improved.
